title: BONUS EPISODE: Game of Thrones’ medieval roots
itunes:title: BONUS EPISODE: Game of Thrones’ medieval roots
itunes:subtitle: Carolyne Larrington explores the medieval world that inspired the fantasy epic in a special HistoryExtra bonus episode, available now for free at https://www.historyextra.com/game-of-thrones-podcast
description:
Carolyne Larrington explores the medieval world that inspired the fantasy epic in a special HistoryExtra bonus episode, available now for free at https://www.historyextra.com/game-of-thrones-podcast
